phone_mail.subject: GEEK Up - Next step of Adventure
phone_mail.body: In the progress of processing your application, we’d love to have a phone discussion, which is around 30-minute long, to learn about your background and expectation for a career opportunity. To make it more convenient for you, let provide us your available time frames by chosing here. Please complete your booking before [3_days_from_email_send_date]. After receiving your response, we will contact you again for confirmation. If you need support, do not hesitate to reach out.

f2f_interview_mail.subject: GEEK Up - Next step of Adventure
f2f_interview_mail.body: It was lovely to get to know about you via our last phone discussion. We’d love to invite you to our office for a Face-to-face meeting, which is around 2 hour long, to learn further about your professional experience. Let provide us your available time frames by chosing here. Your booking should be completed before [3_days_from_email_send_date]. After receiving your response, we will contact you again for confirmation. If you need support, do not hesitate to reach out.

observation_day_mail.subject: GEEK Up - Next step of Adventure
observation_day_mail.body: Thank you for your time joining our face-to-face interview. As mentioned, we’d love to have you experiencing a normal day at our team. This will give you an idea of how our business is running, as well as what it would be like to be a member of GEEK Up. Let provide us your available time frames by chosing here. Your booking should be completed before [3_days_from_email_send_date]. After receive your response, we will contact you again for confirmation. If you need any support, do not hesitate to reach out.

offer_email.subject: GEEK Up - Next step of Adventure
